note: I'm a math/engineering/compsci teacher; a partisan of peace and pi; a CS teacher trainer; the treasurer for BCEA and CSTA MD; using he/him pronouns. I have two fediverse microblogging accounts: this one will be focused more on math, engineering, computing, STEM, and teaching those subjects. My alt account, linked below (same username at firefish.social) will be more focused on local issues, personal/social, making the world a better place, etc.
